articles.title: Gujarat Gas shares climb over 6% even after Q4 profit falls 16%. Should you buy it? - Economic Times
articles.description: Shares of Gujarat Gas rose by 6.5% to hit Rs. 593 despite reporting a 16% YoY fall in net profit. The company's Q4 revenue was at Rs. 4,073.82 crores, a YoY decline of 14%. Gujarat Gas declared a dividend of Rs. 6.5 per equity share. Several analysts reiterat…
articles.content: Shares of Gujarat Gas rallied 6.5% to Rs 593 in Thursday's trade on BSE even after the firm reported a fall in net profit by 16% year-on-year (YoY) to Rs 369 crore, compared to Rs 444 crore in the co… [+2656 chars]
